eth_attr_t Struct Reference
Ethernet Device Access

ETH IO Attributes. More...

#include <eth.h>

Collaboration diagram for eth_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes structure for configuring the ethernet port.

Data Fields

uint8_t mac_addr [8]
 the MAC address
 
uint32_t mode
 Full duplex mode setting.
